name: Corrupted Soldier of Stone
text: This card is also always treated as a Dark monster. You can banish 1 Earth Warrior monster in your GY; Special Summon this card from your GY. If this card is sent to the GY for the Special Summon of a Warrior type monster; you can add 1 Warrior type monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate each effect of "Corrupted Soldier of Stone" once per turn.
